name: Enforcement and Removal Operations (ERO)
short_desc: For information on detainees housed at an ICE facility, family members and attorneys should contact one of the Enforcement and Removal Operations (ERO) field offices. ICE personnel will provide the most current information available regarding the location of the detained individual
description: For information on detainees housed at an ICE facility, family members and attorneys should contact one of the Enforcement and Removal Operations (ERO) field offices. ICE personnel will provide the most current information available regarding the location of the detained individual.
